Title: Nearest Stars Visualizer
Description: Nearest Stars Visualizer - is a free 3D tool for visualizing the location and absolute brightness of the nearest stars in three dimensions
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Nearest Stars Visualizer - is a free 3D tool for visualizing the location and absolute brightness of the nearest stars in three dimensions

Demo: http://www.bodurov.com/NearestStars/

Blog Entry: http://blog.bodurov.com/Nearest-Stars-3D-Map

This Project Evolved into Windows Phone 7 App: http://stars-3d.com/
